= Introduction =

Defines file types and their poperties.


------ 

= Parameters =

|| `Identifier` || string || Identifying name  ||
|| `Name` || string || is it not obvious? ||
|| `BasedOn` || string || other file type this is based on ||
|| `ComputerLanguage` || string ||  ||

|| `Class` || string ||  ||

|| `Extensions` || list || extensions to recognize the file type ||

|| `MIMETypes` || list ||  ||

|| `IsExecutable` || bool ||  ||

= Example =

This is Ruby's definition. Copied from `/Developer/Library/PrivateFrameworks/DevToolsCore.framework/Versions/A/Resources/Standard file types.pbfilespec`
{{{
(
	{
            Identifier = text.script.ruby;
            BasedOn = text.script;
            Extensions = ( rb, rbw );
            MagicWord = (
                "#!/bin/ruby", 
                "#! /bin/ruby", 
                "#!/usr/bin/ruby", 
                "#! /usr/bin/ruby", 
                "#!/usr/local/bin/ruby", 
                "#! /usr/local/bin/ruby"
             );
            ComputerLanguage = shell.ruby;
            Language = "xcode.lang.ruby";
            IsExecutable = YES;
        },
)
}}}
